___server.description: The server which provides the repositories and changelogs

___getAll.description: Action to get all releases and changelogs

___repository.description: Action to get the releases and changelogs of the requested repository

___categories.description: The resource with the repositories and changelogs

___include.description: List of categories to include to the resource.

name: changelog-activity
description: Provides a list of repositories and data about them
